name: Turtle invaded
description:
How to play

Use 'arrow keys' to move and 'x' to shoot.

The Game

Turtle invaded is a space invaders clone that challenges players to fight incoming alien invaders. The objective is to destroy enemies before they reach the bottom of the screen. The game features increasing levels of difficulty and rewards players with points for each enemy defeated. Turtle invaded was made using the Defold game engine, thank you  SparklinLabs for the 2D game assets. You can find the source code here.
